outline:
1. bitter, bitterness
    1. of water or food
    2. of harlot's end, end of wickedness, cry (fig.)
    3. of pain (subst)
  2. bitterly
kjv_def: [phrase] angry, bitter(-ly, -ness), chafed, discontented, [idiom] great, heavy.
strongs_def: bitter (literally or figuratively); also (as noun) bitterness, or (adverbially) bitterly
